channel.title: 5.6 Business Report on
channel.description: Recent content in 5.6 Business Report on

item.title: 5.6.1 Introduction
item.description: ❗ Only authorized accounts can access this section ! Report business # Report business for the purpose of synthesizing detailed data and results of production and business activities of each agent and enterprise through general reports, activities and status. To view statistics and details of business reports, do the following: CLick on Reports > Report business 1.

item.title: 5.6.2 Transaction Summary
item.description: Transaction summary # Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Tick on Sub account to view reports on all child accounts. Step 2: Click Search to display the results. Clicking Reset will return to factory defaults.

item.title: 5.6.3 Transaction Gps Summary
item.description: Transaction GPS summary # Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Tick on Sub account to view reports on all child accounts. Step 2: Click Search to display the results. Clicking Reset will return to factory defaults.

item.title: 5.6.6 Installation Operations
item.description: Installation Operations # Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Tick on Sub account to view reports on all child accounts. Step 2: Click Search to display the results. Clicking Reset will return to factory defaults.

item.title: 5.6.7 Status Statistics
item.description: Status statistics # Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: IMEI: Enter the device IMEI to find, enter 1 or more characters. Number plate: Select the license plate you want to see. Service expire: Select the device’s service period. Update time (minute): Select the time to see the status. Tick on Child account to view reports on all child accounts. Step 2: Click Search to display the results.
